immersivehotbar.option.animation_smoothn:
Controls how smoothly items scale toward their target size.
 Only effective when bounce is disabled.
immersivehotbar.option.bounce_damping.de: How quickly bounce settles. Higher = less bounce.
How strongly items are pulled toward target size. Higher = snappier bounce.
Enables a bouncy effect when hotbar items grow or shrink.
immersivehotbar.option.durability_animat:
If enabled, items that take durability damage will animate. 

Tools and Weapons will only animate if their toggles are enabled.
immersivehotbar.option.durability_glow.d: If enabled, items below the set durability threshold will glow red.
immersivehotbar.option.food_animates.des: If enabled, food items animate while eating.
immersivehotbar.option.glow_threshold.de: When to start rendering the durability glow.
immersivehotbar.option.pop_scale.desc: Default size before items grow. Increase for less intense animations.
immersivehotbar.option.scale_tooltip_off:
Whether the tooltip offset should scale with resolution and GUI size. 

Recommended for consistent placement across fullscreen and windowed modes.

If this option is turned off and the tooltip scale is set too high/low, the tooltip may render off screen and will no longer be visible.
immersivehotbar.option.selected_scale.de: How large the selected hotbar item appears.
immersivehotbar.option.selection_color.d: Sets the highlight color when a hotbar slot is selected.
immersivehotbar.option.should_grow.desc: If enabled, the selected slot will scale larger than the rest.
immersivehotbar.option.show_background.d: Controls when a background is drawn behind each hotbar slot.
immersivehotbar.option.shrink_speed.desc: Controls how fast the item visually shrinks when removed from the slot.
immersivehotbar.option.text_scaling.desc: If disabled, text, durability bars, and the cooldown overlay will not scale with the item.
immersivehotbar.option.tool_animates.des: If enabled, tools (e.g., pickaxe, axe, shovel) will animate when used.
immersivehotbar.option.tools_ignore_boun: If enabled, tools use smooth animation even when bounce is on.
immersivehotbar.option.tooltip_animation: If enabled, the item tooltip will animate when selecting items.
Adjust the vertical position of the tooltip. 

(Vanilla is 52). 

Only works if 'Toggle Tooltip Y Offset' is enabled.
immersivehotbar.option.tooltip_y_offset_: Disables the Y Offest value if configured. Turn this on if you want to change the offset of the tooltip.

immersivehotbar.option.weapon_animates.d: If enabled, weapons (e.g., sword, bow, crossbow) will animate when used.
immersivehotbar.option.weapons_ignore_bo: If enabled, weapons use smooth animation even when bounce is on.
